reviews.review: i got camped three games in a row 3/10

Это моя самая любимая игра.
____
NB:
В ней есть недостатки, она местами однообразна и скучна, она приносит как радость так и плохие эмоции. Эмоции-это самое главное в этой игре. Конечно когда играешь очень долго в симулятор электрика (это я про гены если что) хочется отдохнуть, почти все мои друзья перестали играть в неё, из-за дурацких пробитий в окна и паллеты и однообразного гейплея.
_____
Но не смотря ни на что, я рекомендую купить эту игру, хотя бы по скидке, хоррор возможно вы и не получите, но интересно вам точно будет. Если научиться бегать, выучить тайминги фонариков, изучить нюансы игры за убийц будет весело играть как за сурвов так и за убийц ( с друзьями играть интересней).

Very fun game. It can be fun for players who are new and just want to have fun, or for hard core players who spend hours honing their skills. I highly recommend it to all my friends and family. We all get together and play through discord. I also play with many players I met through the game. I love the challenge and every match can be different so it is not a game to get easily bored with.

Oyun zevkli bir oyun. Toplamda 3k saatim bulunmaktadır ve zevkle oynadım fakat son zamanlarda çıkan optimizasyon sorunu oldukta canımı sıkmaktadır. Onun dışında çok iyi bir oyun ve zevkle satın alıp oynayabilirsiniz.

équilibrage innexistant que du tryhard la commu n'a plus de fun

fun game, though games can easily turn toxic and the developer's approach to balance leaves a lot to be desired, mostly attempting to solve fundamental problems with new perks, maps or killers (with both killers and perks blocked behind a paywall and/or grind). However, all in all, this game still offers a truly unique experience that can't easily be matched elsewhere, and when you get a good game with nice players the core gameplay loops of survivors and killers are really enjoyable and full of new tricks to learn and master as you progress

El juego como concepto es buenisimo, es entretenido y te mantiene viciando mucho. ¿El problema?. Es practicamente imposible tener una expedición exitosa jugando de asesino. La velocidad a la que te bajan motores es una locura, en una persecución de 30 seg te caen 2 (en ocasiones hasta 3) motores y no tienes como contrarrestar eso. Totalmente desbalanceado y es una pena, porque la idea repito, es excelente. Además, claro está, con la toxicidad y la asquerosidad de la gente que lo juega te desmotiva un montón. Hasta el lol está más balanceado que esto.

"very fun, sometimes it has bugs and its a little tough when you just start but I became obsessed so easily. I think the devs get way too much hate then needed and its honestly one of the best games I have ever played, definitely worth it but Id suggest waiting for a discount with buying dlcs..." is the review I left when I had 8.7 hrs at review time. now that I have 206.3 hrs on record, I can honestly say this game is still amazing, Im still obsessed, both sides are equally fun for me, I havent encountered many cheaters or hackers, The match making has been good for the most part, I dont experience bugs but I do lag some times. Still my favorite game ever
